rationale: The VRDR IG focuses on exchanging mortality data between jurisdictional and national entities, using FHIR R4 resources to represent death certificates and related information. This aligns it with Public Health, specifically Disease Reporting, as it enables standardized reporting of deaths. It is US-centric due to its alignment with US standards and regulations for death reporting. It's considered Data Exchange and Workflow Support as it standardizes data and streamlines the reporting process.
